    • addAck

      public boolean addAck(String authToken, String channel, Ack ack)
      Adds a new Ack object for given channel. If this is the first time a channel is assigned a new Ack, a new State object is created.
      Parameters:
      channel -
      ack -

    • isAckAcknowledged

      public boolean isAckAcknowledged(String authToken, String channel, int ackId)
      Checks if the Ack with a given id is acknowledged.

    • getRequestedAckStatuses

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getRequestedAckStatuses(String authToken, String channel, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode requestedAcksInJson)
      Returns the Ack statuses of requested Ack id:s as a JSON node. JSON node with the id:s is given as a parameter. Example: {"acks": [1,3,4]}

    • getCurrentAckValue

      public int getCurrentAckValue(String authToken, String channel)
      Returns the current Ack value for given token and channel. A new State is created, so this method must be called first before other Ack manipulating methods are called.
      Parameters:
      authToken -
      channel -
      Returns:
